metadata.title: CVE-2020-25638 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in hibernate-core in versions prior to and including5.4.23.Final. A SQL injection in the implementation of the JPA Criteria APIcan permit unsanitized literals when a literal is used in the SQL commentsof the query. This flaw could allow an attacker to access unauthorizedinformation or possibly conduct further attacks. The highest threat fromthis vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25638` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhibernate3-java - 3.6.10.Final-11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libhibernate3-java package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.10.Final-11').
